description:
Author: AI Osipov
Artist: Osipov AI
Format : MP3.
Bit rate: from 32 kbps to 192 kbps.
Duration: 737:18:56 .
Description: Alexei Ilyich Osipov , professor at the Moscow Theological Academy and Seminary . Born: March 31, 1938 .
He graduated from the Moscow Theological Seminary and the Moscow Theological Academy . Since 1965, the basic theology lecturer at the Moscow Theological Academy. In 1985 he was awarded the degree of Doctor of Divinity .
" Alexei Ilyich Osipov - one of the brightest Orthodox theologians of our time : deeply educated, intelligent ( and it is - is not always synonymous ) , spiritually sober, his performances are noted for their great language and a complete lack of unctuous . And with a sense of humor all right . After each lecture - answers to questions , not necessarily relating to the performance. Often this is even more interesting than the main part " ( a review of one of the visitors).
Attention : 16-05-2012 torrent perezalit city , added to the lecture: Apologetics . Moscow Theological Academy , 2011-2012 and 2010-2012 Public lectures .
